body.name: SAMSUNG QN55Q70CAFXZA 55 Inch QLED 4K Quantum HDR Dual LED Smart TV with an Additional 1 Year Coverage (2023)
body.stockDetail: Only 18 left in stock - order soon.
features: QUANTUM PROCESSOR W/ 4K UPSCALING: The Quantum Processor does the work for you, transforming your content into 4K; It’s engineered to optimize your picture to 4K resolution, enhance depth and improve color and sound

MOTION XCELERATOR TURBO+ (4K @120 HZ): Keep up with the supersonic speed and catch every thrilling frame without lag or motion blur. You’ll enjoy seamless action and sensational 4K visuals at speeds up to 120Hz

DUAL LED: You’ll enjoy beautifully balanced colors with dedicated warm and cool Dual LED backlights. Get stronger and accurate contrast with innovative technology that adapts automatically to match your content

100% COLOR VOLUME W/ QUANTUM DOT: Take in a billion shades of unwavering color and enjoy vivid, lifelike color at any brightness level as Quantum Dot technology works to create every shade you see on screen
1 Year Extended Epic Protect Coverage in Addition to the Included Full Manufacturer Coverage. Intended for Residential Use Only
body.description: Epic Protect Coverage Features & Benefits Mechanical & Electrical FailuresPower Surge ProtectionNationwide Network of Service Providers24/7/365 Customer Support, and more. When does the plan begin? All plans begin from the date of purchase and are inclusive of the manufacturer's limited coverage. Benefits such as Power Surge Protection and Mechanical & Electrical Failures (if purchased) begin on Day 1. What items are eligible for Epic Protect? Electronics with at least a 90-day manufacturer limited coverage in the United States.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Samsung Q70CA Series TV with Epic Protect Extended Coverage Don’t Wait for Life To Show You a View Worth Remembering, Make Your Escape with Samsung Q70CA QLED TV Samsung Q70CA QLED 4K Smart TV - Dual LED - Quantum HDR - Quantum Processor with 4K Upscaling - 100 Percent Color Volume with Quantum Dot - Supreme UHD Dimming - Motion Xcelerator Turbo - Wide Viewing Angle - Real Depth Enhancer - FreeSync Premium Pro - ALLM - Super Ultra Wide Game View and Game Bar - Mini Map Zoom - AirSlim Design - Black Slim Simple Plus - Smart - Tizen - Universal Guide - Ambient Mode-Plus - Multiple Voice Assistants - Samsung TV Plus - Multi View - SolarCell Remote - SmartThings Compatible - Samsung Health - Google Meet - Telemedicine - ConnecTime - Gaming Hub - HDMI - Fixed Rate Link - VRR - eARC - USB - LAN - Wi-Fi - Bluetooth - RS232C - IP Control Support - Optical - Object Tracking Sound Lite - Q-Symphony - Active Voice Amplifier - Filmmaker Mode - VESA Compatible - (Black) This bundle includes one (1) Samsung QN800C Series TV with one (1) year OR two (2) years OR four (4) years of Epic Protect extended coverage in addition to the manufacturer's included coverage. Intended for Residential Use ONLY

Tune into your happy place Escape with the QLED 4K Q70C with 4K upscaling, impressive color volume, and a mind-blowing, slim design. Enjoy content in ultra-high definition as everything is transformed into 4K resolution by the Quantum Processor. But the experience goes beyond delivering vivid contrast and 100% Color Volume.

Quantum Processor with 4K Upscaling The Quantum Processor is engineered to intelligently optimize your picture to 4K resolution, enhance depth and improve color and sound. The processor also helps other features, like the Smart Hub and the Samsung Gaming Hub, run smoothly and efficiently.

Motion Xcelerator Turbo Feel the thrill of smooth performance during even the fastest games and action scenes. Keep up with the supersonic speed and catch every thrilling frame without lag or motion blur. Instead, you’ll enjoy seamless action and sensational 4K visuals at speeds up to 120Hz.

100% Color Volume with Quantum Dot Take in a billion shades of unwavering color and enjoy vivid, lifelike color at any brightness level as Quantum Dot technology works to create every shade you see on screen because even a clear blue sky can contain thousands of different colors.

Epic Protect Coverage Features & Benefits Mechanical & Electrical FailuresPower Surge ProtectionNationwide Network of Service Providers24/7/365 Customer Support, and more. When does the plan begin? All plans begin from the date of purchase and are inclusive of the manufacturer's limited coverage. Benefits such as Power Surge Protection and Mechanical & Electrical Failures (if purchased) begin on Day 1. What items are eligible for Epic Protect? Electronics with at least a 90-day manufacturer limited coverage in the United States. Covered Products Televisions Laptops Tablets Home Theater Headphones And More

reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Awesome quality Samsung Smart TV
reviews.reviewText: Everything about this product is great, the picture quality, the size, extra HDMI ports, the stand it sits on gives it a stylish look. It’s perfect for use on gaming systems. Would buy again without a doubt.

reviews.reviewText: All I can say it’s Amazing!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 24, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Super easy to operate. Great quality great price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Not made in China!!!
reviews.reviewText: I bought this TV to replace a 2015 Samsung TV. The quality of the picture is great and I love all the bells and whistles. The remote is a little too simple for me. I kept the remote for the 2015 model and it works perfectly! It even controls the Xfinity cable box. The TV remembers the last source you used and uses that when you turn the TV on. The power saver auto-shut off feature is optional. The only downside is the sound quality. I don't hold it against the TV. It's just a function of flat-screen TVs and the location of the speaker. I bought a Yamaha sound bar (not made in China!) to go with it and now I'm set.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Software problems. Online TV "technicians".
reviews.reviewText: Captions did not work and I am hearing challenged. Online with "TV "technicians" over 8 hours. Why is the remote so SMALL?Good picture.
